script:
;;1
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# voice 2001 "myuruniru_0006"
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# textflame 1 1
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
@ミョルニル
突然の～
ミョルニルクイズ～！

# eye %(unit_a)s "close"
# textflame 1 1
@ミョルニル
ミョルニルちゃんのクイズに
答えられないと…

# voice 2001 "myuruniru_0036"
# eye %(unit_a)s "normal"
# textflame 1 1
@ミョルニル
マスタはおうちに
かえれませ～ん！
いくよ～♪

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@%(unitName:unit_a)s
ミョルニルちゃんの
属性を当ててみて～！

# se "SE_0734"
# select "雷" "select_label_1" "光" "select_label_2" "炎" "select_label_3"
ミョルニルちゃんの
属性を当ててみて～！

# label "select_label_1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_3"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
